What can be done to combat maternal deaths? 
/circle6 Most of the maternal deaths are linked with three types of delays which can result in an 
increase in maternal morbidity and mortality. Th ey are:
Delay 1: Delay in recognising the problem (lack of awareness of danger signs) and deciding 
to seek care (due to inaccessible health facility, lack of resources to pay for services
